title: PLAZA / PISSFLAUBERT AND FTW
description: Near Kineema, two young gentlemen wishing to introduce Martinaise to the SKULLS brand are idling away, looking at the beast of a motor carriage. It is possible to get their jackets if you succeed the red check.

dialogueTree.title: Pissf****t: ""That ride is fucking lightning!" t..."
dialogueTree.text: "That ride is fucking lightning!" the young man exclaims.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Hey, Pissf****t, look who it is! I..."
links.text: "Hey, Pissf****t, look who it is! It's the bully. He ran out of people to be an asshole to."

links.title: You: ""Do you happen to know what happene..."
links.text: "Do you happen to know what happened to the victim's armour?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Nope," his mouth makes a popping s..."
links.text: "Nope," his mouth makes a popping sound. "But Cindy does."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Don't tell him that," the other on..."
links.text: "Don't tell him that," the other one cuts in, too late. "SKULLS don't tattle, man. Cindy wouldn't."

links.title: You: ""You mean Cindy the SKULL?""
links.text: "You mean Cindy the SKULL?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""No," the young man replies quickly..."
links.text: "No," the young man replies quickly, shaking his head. "A different Cindy. From out of town. She doesn't know shit about armoured gloves, that's for sure."

links.title: Drama: "He *did* mean Cindy the SKULL."
links.text: He *did* mean Cindy the SKULL.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "All right -- we have a lead on the..."
links.text: All right -- we have a lead on the gloves.

links.title: You: ""Where can I find this 'Cindy'?""
links.text: "Where can I find this 'Cindy'?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""You already said she's a SKULL..."..."
links.text: "You already said she's a SKULL..." he mumbles apologetically. "The last I saw her, she was hanging around the old apartment building near the pier."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Just don't tell her you heard it f..."
links.text: "Just don't tell her you heard it from Piss and Fuck, alright? I think she wanted those gloves for herself." There's a plea in his eyes. "Be cool, man, okay?"

links.title: You: ""Who are the *SKULLS*?""
links.text: "Who are the *SKULLS*?"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""You don't know? What kind of cop a..."
links.text: "You don't know? What kind of cop are you?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "It's not a question, don't get into..."
links.text: It's not a question, don't get into it.

links.title: You: ""I'm so glad you asked!""
links.text: "I'm so glad you asked!"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""The question was rhetorical," he r..."
links.text: "The question was rhetorical," he replies, raising his open hand. "The SKULLS are *the* most vicious gang of the Besmertnyé."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Besmertnyé or the Besmertie -- the..."
links.text: Besmertnyé or the Besmertie -- the *immortals* -- are West Revacholian crime syndicates.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""The nastiest bunch of psychos ever..."
links.text: "The nastiest bunch of psychos ever! Jacking carriages and getting into high-speed chases."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Possessing an infinite amount of f..."
links.text: "Possessing an infinite amount of fuck-all swagger, infamous for their non-verbal *modus operandi*."

links.title: You: ""Non-verbal?""
links.text: "Non-verbal?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If a SKULL spots you, he will pull..."
links.text: "If a SKULL spots you, he will pull out his dagger and stab you without saying a single word."

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant's voice is as calm a..."
links.text: The lieutenant's voice is as calm as usual -- a testament to the violence and death he's witnessed through the sight of his firearm.

links.title: Pissf****t: ""SKULLS don't talk to pigs. Or each..."
links.text: "SKULLS don't talk to pigs. Or each other. They just fuck and fight."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They usually occupy the Burnt-Out..."
links.text: "They usually occupy the Burnt-Out Quarter in Jamrock. Or you can find them loitering around their brightly-painted, bottom-lighted vehicles."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Oh, I can't wait to become a SKULL..."
links.text: "Oh, I can't wait to become a SKULL. Bottom-lights are *wretched* aggressive."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "No, they rea..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "No, they really, really aren't. It's porno-tuning. Say no to the porno."

links.title: You: ""Of course I do, I'm just testing y..."
links.text: "Of course I do, I'm just testing you boys."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""The SKULLS are the most vicious ga..."
links.text: "The SKULLS are the most vicious gang of the Besmertnyé." His voice rings with excitement.

links.title: You: ""No, I really don't.""
links.text: "No, I really don't."

links.title: You: ""Do you know anything about the mur..."
links.text: "Do you know anything about the murder that took place here?" (Point to the yard.)

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Murder?""
links.text: "Murder?"

links.title: You: ""A man was hanged in the backyard o..."
links.text: "A man was hanged in the backyard of the Whirling-in-Rags."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah, sure, we'll gladly tell you..."
links.text: "Yeah, sure, we'll gladly tell you everything we know about it." He clears his throat. "It was a man."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Also, he was hanged.""
links.text: "Also, he was hanged."

links.title: You: ""Anything else?""
links.text: "Anything else?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""He was hanged from a tree.""
links.text: "He was hanged from a tree."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah, I mean... duh.""
links.text: "Yeah, I mean... duh."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""These punks don't know anything. L..."
links.text: "These punks don't know anything. Let's just move along."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Hey! Stop right there! How does on..."
links.text: "Hey! Stop right there! How does one know anything?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Ah -- this sounds like epistemology..."
links.text: Ah -- this sounds like epistemology. A field so occupied by thought that it begins to question thought itself.

links.title: You: ""I know that you don't know shit.""
links.text: "I know that you don't know shit."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Exactly! How can one know shit?""
links.text: "Exactly! How can one know shit?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "We should mo..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "We should move along."

links.title: You: ""Please explain.""
links.text: "Please explain."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Knowing. We think that we know, bu..."
links.text: "Knowing. We think that we know, but where does the thought originate from?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""It seems that we can only think bu..."
links.text: "It seems that we can only think but never *know*."

links.title: You: ""So you're telling me you don't kno..."
links.text: "So you're telling me you don't know anything?"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Precisely.""
links.text: "Precisely."

links.title: You: ""Let's just change the topic.""
links.text: "Let's just change the topic."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Couldn't keep up, huh?" The young..."
links.text: "Couldn't keep up, huh?" The young man shakes his head. "Sure, let's try something different then."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Exactly! How can one know shit? Fo..."
links.text: "Exactly! How can one know shit? For example: How can one be sure that there truly is a body hanging behind the hostel?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""What if it's art... or just a mere..."
links.text: "What if it's art... or just a mere spectre?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Maybe it's true -- the hanged man i..."
links.text: Maybe it's true -- the hanged man is merely a prop in a performance, we are the audience, and the artist is hiding somewhere in the dark?

links.title: You: ""Believe me, I'd know. I *know* spe..."
links.text: "Believe me, I'd know. I *know* spectres." (Rub your temple.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises an eyebrow bu..."
links.text: The lieutenant raises an eyebrow but does not comment.

links.title: You: ""That could be the case, yes... a b..."
links.text: "That could be the case, yes... a brilliant work of art!"

links.title: You: ""It's not. A man is dead and we nee..."
links.text: "It's not. A man is dead and we need answers."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""So what do you think we know?""
links.text: "So what do you think we know?"

links.title: You: ""What does that mean?""
links.text: "What does that mean?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Fucking *philosophy*, man. You can..."
links.text: "Fucking *philosophy*, man. You can do aggressive shit with philosophy. Justify shit."

links.title: Empathy: "Like murder. Or wasting your life a..."
links.text: Like murder. Or wasting your life away.

links.title: You: ""I'm not going to entertain you wit..."
links.text: "I'm not going to entertain you with this any longer."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Sure, sure," the blond man says, q..."
links.text: "Sure, sure," the blond man says, quickly nodding. "Understandable. Fuck and I appreciate your effort though."

links.title: You: ""Don't fuck around. I am the law.""
links.text: "Don't fuck around. I am the law."

links.title: You: ""Never mind, this is useless.""
links.text: "Never mind, this is useless."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Mhm." He throws a longing glance a..."
links.text: "Mhm." He throws a longing glance at the Kineema.

links.title: You: ""Why haven't I seen any SKULLS arou..."
links.text: "Why haven't I seen any SKULLS around Martinaise?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Union does their share of poli..."
links.text: "The Union does their share of policing in Martinaise, at least where gangs are concerned," the lieutenant replies instead. "That's why there isn't much organized crime around here."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Apart from the Union themselves of..."
links.text: Apart from the Union themselves of course.

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Well," the young man remarks in a..."
links.text: "Well," the young man remarks in a voice filled with longing, eyes glazed over, "there's Cindy..."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah, the girl Piss blathered out,..."
links.text: "Yeah, the girl Piss blathered out, when you asked about the armour. She's a true artist of the future, just like Arno van Eyck or Rietveldt. A real SKULL."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""By the way, if you see Cindy, give..."
links.text: "By the way, if you see Cindy, give her our regards," he adds, returning from whatever void he was just visiting.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah. Cindy the SKULL!" He lights..."
links.text: "Yeah. Cindy the SKULL!" He lights up. "A true artist of the future, just like Arno van Eyck or Rietveldt."

links.title: You: ""Do you guys know Cindy the SKULL?""
links.text: "Do you guys know Cindy the SKULL?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Oh yeah, Cindy's a right proper SK..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, Cindy's a right proper SKULL..." The young man's eyes glaze over, his voice filled with longing.

links.title: You: ""Not so sure about that. She's a bi..."
links.text: "Not so sure about that. She's a bit of a communist."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Lies! Cindy's all SKULL. A true ar..."
links.text: "Lies! Cindy's all SKULL. A true artist of the future, just like Arno van Eyck."

links.title: You: ""Actually, Cindy told me herself th..."
links.text: "Actually, Cindy told me herself that she's not a very good SKULL."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""And you believed that?" He laughs...."
links.text: "And you believed that?" He laughs. "No, man, Cindy's all SKULL. A true artist of the future, just like Arno van Eyck."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah," the other guy lights up too..."
links.text: "Yeah," the other guy lights up too. "A true artist of the future, just like Arno van Eyck."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""By the way, if you see Cindy, give..."
links.text: "By the way, if you see Cindy, give her our regards," he adds, returning from whatever void he was just visiting.

links.title: Rhetoric: "For all their nihilistic posturing,..."
links.text: For all their nihilistic posturing, these young men are not lacking in youthful idealism.

links.title: Empathy: "Odd. There isn't a hint of hate in..."
links.text: Odd. There isn't a hint of hate in them. It's like they're 'Pissf****t' and 'Fuck the World' out of some kind moral obligation.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant, on your left, is un..."
links.text: The lieutenant, on your left, is unusually lenient toward them.

links.title: You: ""I see you kids are into modern dan..."
links.text: "I see you kids are into modern dance music?"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Oh, man, yeah!" he exclaims, then..."
links.text: "Oh, man, yeah!" he exclaims, then stops himself, processing the rest of your question. "We're not fucking kids, man!"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yeah, we're not fucking kids!" He..."
links.text: "Yeah, we're not fucking kids!" He glances at your partner and quickly adds: "And we're also not fucking confrontational. The mood is chill here."

links.title: Half Light: "Still a bit rattled by the earlier..."
links.text: Still a bit rattled by the earlier shock?

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Be wary of the abyss," his blond f..."
links.text: "Be wary of the abyss," his blond friend adds ominously and points to his temple.

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Probably because of how *non-verba..."
links.text: "Probably because of how *non-verbal* their mode of operation is going to be," the lieutenant answers for the two rebels. "It's a threat."

links.title: Half Light: "A threat? Retaliate immediately. Yo..."
links.text: A threat? Retaliate immediately. You'll see -- they'll fall over like bitch-leaves. These boys ain't got the *cojones*.

links.title: You: ""I'm going to look you boys up in t..."
links.text: "I'm going to look you boys up in the police registry, come to both of your houses at night and MURDER YOU IN YOUR GODDAMN FUCKING SLEEP!!!"

links.title: Pissf****t: "As your bellow echoes through the s..."
links.text: As your bellow echoes through the street, the boys quiver ever so slightly and gaze down at their shoes, pretending to be deaf.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right." Lieutenant Kitsuragi adjus..."
links.text: "Right." Lieutenant Kitsuragi adjusts his spectacles. "You heard the detective. He's gonna ask you some questions now."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Don't ever do that again. But good..."
links.text: Don't ever do that again. But good call, detective.

links.title: You: ""A threat? Good. I like those.""
links.text: "A threat? Good. I like those."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But I don't," the lieutenant inter..."
links.text: "But I don't," the lieutenant interjects quickly. "In fact I dislike them so much I'm willing to drag you boys back to the station just to calm myself down."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Hey uh... there's no need for that..."
links.text: "Hey uh... there's no need for that." He raises his open palms. "We're just talking here. Joking too. Stay light, man."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yeah, didn't you cops, like, have..."
links.text: "Yeah, didn't you cops, like, have some questions about SKULLs or some shit?"

links.title: You: ""Don't fuck with me, boys. I'm one..."
links.text: "Don't fuck with me, boys. I'm one of the bad cops."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Whoa... c'mon, man..." He raises h..."
links.text: "Whoa... c'mon, man..." He raises his open palms. "We're just talking here. Just words, nothing wrong with that."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yeah, no need to throw your author..."
links.text: "Yeah, no need to throw your authority in our faces."

links.title: Authority: "That's right! Way to put them in th..."
links.text: That's right! Way to put them in the little boys corner!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You wanna talk? Let's talk, boys."..."
links.text: "You wanna talk? Let's talk, boys." His eyes meet yours. "Ask them."

links.title: Empathy: "He liked how you decisively shut do..."
links.text: He liked how you decisively shut down a situation that could have turned into a farce.

links.title: You: ""I just wanted to talk about music..."
links.text: "I just wanted to talk about music and now there's a conflict all of the sudden... it's too much." (Nervously shake your head.)

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Uh... that's right," the young man..."
links.text: "Uh... that's right," the young man says, looking unsure of himself. "You... you should back off and let silence rule supreme."

links.title: Authority: "What is wrong with you? Now you're..."
links.text: What is wrong with you? Now you're just empowering these punks.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is ridiculous." The lieutenan..."
links.text: "This is ridiculous." The lieutenant gives you an irritated glance. "Boys, do you know why the gang is called SKULLS?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yeah -- the skull symbolizes the e..."
links.text: "Yeah -- the skull symbolizes the embrace of death and nothingness, present in all of us, the vehicle of our future operations. Death and nothingness."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They're called SKULLS because when..."
links.text: "They're called SKULLS because when you're shot dead in the middle of the street, the skull is the only part the stray dogs won't eat."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Just trust me and follow my lead."
links.text: Just trust me and follow my lead.

links.title: You: ""Kim, maybe you shouldn't scare the..."
links.text: "Kim, maybe you shouldn't scare them like that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You fired a gun at a little girl,"..."
links.text: "You fired a gun at a little girl," the lieutenant replies with no discernible change in his tone. "I think I've got a *little* bit of wiggling room here."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Ugh..." A sudden flash of panic fl..."
links.text: "Ugh..." A sudden flash of panic flies across his face. "I... I didn't mean anything by that. Just playing with words here, that's all."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah, man..." the other one quickl..."
links.text: "Yeah, man..." the other one quickly joins in. "We're just talking, philosophising. No crimes are being committed. And... and you wanted to talk too, right?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You aimed a loaded gun at little g..."
links.text: "You aimed a loaded gun at little girl," the lieutenant replies with no discernible change in his tone. "I think I've got a *little* bit of wiggling room here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You punched a twelve-year-old boy..."
links.text: "You punched a twelve-year-old boy in the face. I think I'm still pretty much in the clear here," the lieutenant replies. There's is no discernible change in his tone.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You tried to punch a twelve year o..."
links.text: "You tried to punch a twelve year old and almost knocked yourself out," the lieutenant replies with no discernible change in his tone. "I think I'm still pretty much in the clear here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And do what? Walk away, knowing th..."
links.text: "And do what? Walk away, knowing that there are two delusional hoodlums interested in joining a criminal group whose main areas of expertise are jacking cars and killing police officers?"

links.title: You: ""I've come to regret my violent way..."
links.text: "I've come to regret my violent ways, Kim...."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Pick a better time, officer." The..."
links.text: "Pick a better time, officer." The lieutenant's voice rings cold and certain. "*After* we've dealt with these wannabe cop-killers."

links.title: Empathy: "He did not appreciate you undermini..."
links.text: He did not appreciate you undermining his authority in front of the two punks.

links.title: You: ""Well...""
links.text: "Well..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't *well* me. This might be fin..."
links.text: "Don't *well* me. This might be fine by you but it certainly isn't fine by me. We've got to try to nip this kind of behaviour in the bud."

links.title: Fuck the World: "The young men stare at the two of y..."
links.text: The young men stare at the two of you in confusion.

links.title: You: ""When you put it that way..." (Turn..."
links.text: "When you put it that way..." (Turn to the two young men and tap a finger against your head.) "Dog food!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "I... appreci..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "I... appreciate the effort."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, but... fuck the police.""
links.text: "Yeah, but... fuck the police."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. You don't get to say that." Hi..."
links.text: "No. You don't get to say that." His voice is sharp as a blade. "Police officers put their lives on the line to protect the people of Revachol, while punks like these joke about joining a cop-killer clan."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you got something else to ask f..."
links.text: "If you got something else to ask from them, do it now and let's move on. I don't want to waste any more time here."

links.title: You: ""So, boys, wanna feed the dogs?""
links.text: "So, boys, wanna feed the dogs?"

links.title: Pissf****t: "No reply. The blond rebel scratches..."
links.text: No reply. The blond rebel scratches his chin, deliberately not focusing his gaze on anything. He looks very uncomfortable.

links.title: Fuck the World: "The other one shuffles uncomfortabl..."
links.text: The other one shuffles uncomfortably, nevertheless continuing to steal glances at the lieutenant's motor carriage.

links.title: Half Light: "Scared little bitches..."
links.text: Scared little bitches...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a threat," the lieutenant ans..."
links.text: "It's a threat," the lieutenant answers for the two rebels. "An impotent threat of violence."

links.title: You: ""Who's van Eyck?""
links.text: "Who's van Eyck?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Old man, it doesn't matter. You'll..."
links.text: "Old man, it doesn't matter. You'll be long gone before his greatness is recognized."

links.title: Shivers: "A young woman kneels on wooden plan..."
links.text: A young woman kneels on wooden planks, still looking for something lost ages ago. She's nodding her head along to the signal coming in through her headphones.

links.title: You: ""Hey, I'm *only* 42!""
links.text: "Hey, I'm *only* 42!"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Holy shit, that's even older than..."
links.text: "Holy shit, that's even older than I thought!" He bursts out laughing.

links.title: Pissf****t: ""You're fucking ancient, man.""
links.text: "You're fucking ancient, man."

links.title: You: ""So, you're saying I'm an old man?!""
links.text: "So, you're saying I'm an old man?!"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""No, no, no," he quickly assures yo..."
links.text: "No, no, no," he quickly assures you and takes a step back. "Just a bit older than us, ain't that right, Piss?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yeah," the blond man replies with..."
links.text: "Yeah," the blond man replies with a nod. "That's what I mean. You're young as fuck, don't worry."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I guess you're right. I'm pr..."
links.text: "Yeah, I guess you're right. I'm pretty old."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yep." He nods enthusiastically. "O..."
links.text: "Yep." He nods enthusiastically. "Old as fuck."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah, man. It's like... at death's..."
links.text: "Yeah, man. It's like... at death's door. No wonder you know nothing about the future. You won't *be* there."

links.title: Logic: "Judging by that, van Eyck is some s..."
links.text: Judging by that, van Eyck is some sort of musician. Or... killer?

links.title: Shivers: "A young woman kneels on a sheet of..."
links.text: A young woman kneels on a sheet of ice as if looking for something lost ages ago. She bends until her right ear touches the frozen water. She listens to it crack, slowly.

links.title: You: ""Why aren't there more SKULLS in Ma..."
links.text: "Why aren't there more SKULLS in Martinaise?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Union does their share of poli..."
links.text: "The Union does their share of policing in Martinaise, at least where gangs are concerned," the lieutenant replies instead. "That's why there isn't much organized crime around here."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Apart from the Union themselves of..."
links.text: Apart from the Union themselves of course.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Don't you worry about that. We're..."
links.text: "Don't you worry about that. We're gonna make up for the deficit."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yeah we are!" The young men exchan..."
links.text: "Yeah we are!" The young men exchange approving nods.

links.title: You: ""Your rhetoric is confusing. Are yo..."
links.text: "Your rhetoric is confusing. Are you a part of the SKULLS or not?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""We're not *franchised* SKULLS -- w..."
links.text: "We're not *franchised* SKULLS -- well, not yet. Once we get our name out there, we'll have a chance to join them."

links.title: You: ""And what makes you think that the..."
links.text: "And what makes you think that the organization would accept you?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Because we can be just as psycho a..."
links.text: "Because we can be just as psycho and vicious. You'll see."

links.title: You: ""I see.""
links.text: "I see."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""But in a non-threatening and defin..."
links.text: "But in a non-threatening and definitely legal way," the other one quickly adds and whispers something to his friend.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""We'll fuck the system from the ins..."
links.text: "We'll fuck the system from the inside later, just be cool now. The damage will be tenfold."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Right on, Fuck," the blond agrees..."
links.text: "Right on, Fuck," the blond agrees and provocatively spits on the pavement. "So what's happening now?"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Oh, you'll see for sure once we're..."
links.text: "Oh, you'll see for sure once we're in -- it's the last thing you'll ever see before the void consumes you."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Throw him off his game."
links.text: Throw him off his game.

links.title: Half Light: "You don't feel very scared."
links.text: You don't feel very scared.

links.title: You: ""Are you implying I might be in som..."
links.text: "Are you implying I might be in some sort of danger?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Pssshhew." The young man raises tw..."
links.text: "Pssshhew." The young man raises two fingers to his temple and an imaginary hammer hits the cartridge.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure a SKULL would say tha..."
links.text: "Are you sure a SKULL would say that?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Uh..." He looks confused. "Well......"
links.text: "Uh..." He looks confused. "Well... yeah I mean, we're only saying *practice* things for now, so... We don't mean no harm to the SKULLS brand. Or to you."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""This is definitely something the S..."
links.text: "This is definitely something the SKULLS would say, but we're not trying to encroach on the SKULLS brand in any way. On the contrary, we're just here to market it."

links.title: You: ""Hold on, why does a criminal gang..."
links.text: "Hold on, why does a criminal gang need marketing?"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""We think of it more like two franc..."
links.text: "We think of it more like two franchises merging, you know -- us two and the SKULLS. I really feel like we would add more to the table."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Spice things up here in Martinaise..."
links.text: "Spice things up here in Martinaise, you know. Get the old machine of pain and suffering oiled up real good."

links.title: Authority: "What would these guys have to offer..."
links.text: What would these guys have to offer to any organization?

links.title: You: ""Okay, I get what the SKULLS do, bu..."
links.text: "Okay, I get what the SKULLS do, but what do you franchise in? Youth unemployment?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Whatever, man. Work is for pussies..."
links.text: "Whatever, man. Work is for pussies." The young man frowns, aggrieved. "You wouldn't get it anyway."

links.title: You: ""Doesn't it already have enough spi..."
links.text: "Doesn't it already have enough spice?"

links.title: Fuck the World: "The youth looks confused for a mome..."
links.text: The youth looks confused for a moment. "There can always be more. In the end it won't matter. 'Til then..."

links.title: You: ""So you're just *pretending* to be..."
links.text: "So you're just *pretending* to be as nasty and vicious as the SKULLS?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Hey, we can be just as hard! Like..."
links.text: "Hey, we can be just as hard! Like pavement on top of pavement, or a brick on top of another brick."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Or a grave on top of a grave.""
links.text: "Or a grave on top of a grave."

links.title: Rhetoric: "These kids have the vocabulary but..."
links.text: These kids have the vocabulary but might be missing a brain.

links.title: Logic: "Wouldn't a grave on top of a grave..."
links.text: Wouldn't a grave on top of a grave be just a big hole? What's hard about holes?

links.title: Endurance: "Digging them."
links.text: Digging them.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Filling them up, baby!"
links.text: Filling them up, baby!

links.title: You: ""Enough about this *skullery* then...."
links.text: "Enough about this *skullery* then." (Conclude.)

links.title: You: ""What's with the jackets?""
links.text: "What's with the jackets?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""What about them?""
links.text: "What about them?"

links.title: You: "(Turn to the blond youth.) "Why doe..."
links.text: (Turn to the blond youth.) "Why does your jacket have 'PISSF****T' written on it?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Well, first off, it's a statement..."
links.text: "Well, first off, it's a statement and not *necessarily* something that characterizes me as a person, even though the statement has character. And I *do* like piss..."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""The word PISSF****T epitomizes the..."
links.text: "The word PISSF****T epitomizes the struggle taking place in the world, things being defined as they seem, not as they are. And -- I guess -- it's also about communal spirit, the future, and *truly* appreciating our differences."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Also, you've got to admit, it catc..."
links.text: "Also, you've got to admit, it catches the eye. And since the grand piper is slowly but steadily moving towards basing the economy on it -- attention -- it is imperative that the medium itself convey the message."

links.title: You: ""Ee... what?""
links.text: "Ee... what?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""What I mean by this is -- we are *..."
links.text: "What I mean by this is -- we are *all* Pissf****ts. And that the world is inherently meaningless."

links.title: Inland Empire: "That much is true."
links.text: That much is true.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Though he seemed lacking in vocabul..."
links.text: Though he seemed lacking in vocabulary, it seems that the young man has expertise in at least one field, even if it's rather narrow.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It seems that the young man has a c..."
links.text: It seems that the young man has a certain expertise in at least one field, even if it's rather narrow.

links.title: You: ""Makes sense.""
links.text: "Makes sense."

links.title: You: "(Turn to the dark-haired youth.) "W..."
links.text: (Turn to the dark-haired youth.) "Why do you have 'FUCK THE WORLD' written on your jacket?"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""I can answer that. Many men keep s..."
links.text: "I can answer that. Many men keep searching for *the one*. For so-called true love, which is actually just obsession masquerading as kinship. The thrill of the chase, the hollowness that fills your chest cavity after catching it."

links.title: Drama: "I'm wondering if the poetics come w..."
links.text: I'm wondering if the poetics come with the jacket or are they derived from something else entirely?

links.title: Fuck the World: ""To catch a fish you need to hurl t..."
links.text: "To catch a fish you need to hurl the lure many times, and even then it isn't certain that you'll get anything. If you blow up the lake, though..."

links.title: You: ""Blow it up!""
links.text: "Blow it up!"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""...you get more fish in a shorter..."
links.text: "...you get more fish in a shorter time. And, for time is of the essence and fleeting ever so quickly, one must think of a way to fuck the whole world -- and not get caught up in fucking some *one*."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Because when one fucks everything,..."
links.text: "Because when one fucks everything, he fucks nothing. And that, to me, feels glorious -- sticking your dick into the void."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Hate to admit it, but in a weird wa..."
links.text: Hate to admit it, but in a weird way he's got a point.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Is it a *coincidence* that here we..."
links.text: Is it a *coincidence* that here we have two bad-ass jackets and two bad-ass cops?

links.title: You: ""Hey, Kim..." (Lower your voice.)"
links.text: "Hey, Kim..." (Lower your voice.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes?""
links.text: "Yes?"

links.title: You: ""Do you think it's a coincidence?""
links.text: "Do you think it's a coincidence?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is?""
links.text: "What is?"

links.title: You: ""There are two of us and two of the..."
links.text: "There are two of us and two of these jackets..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you implying?" The lieute..."
links.text: "What are you implying?" The lieutenant looks confused.

links.title: You: ""Which one would *you* wear?""
links.text: "Which one would *you* wear?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not sure I understand you, det..."
links.text: "I'm not sure I understand you, detective."

links.title: You: ""Are you more of a 'PISSF****T' or..."
links.text: "Are you more of a 'PISSF****T' or a 'FUCK THE WORLD' kind of guy?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither.""
links.text: "Neither."

links.title: You: ""C'mon Kim, it's just a mental exer..."
links.text: "C'mon Kim, it's just a mental exercise!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine, if only to end this discussi..."
links.text: "Fine, if only to end this discussion: Theoretically, if I were a juvenile delinquent -- if I were to already be down that path -- I think 'PISSF****T' is the stronger of the two statements."

links.title: You: ""No way! If anything, I'm the *PISS..."
links.text: "No way! If anything, I'm the *PISSF****T* in this scenario."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine," the lieutenant shrugs. "'FU..."
links.text: "Fine," the lieutenant shrugs. "'FUCK THE WORLD' just seemed to fit you more, considering your... heroic exit attempts."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You always get to be the crazy one,..."
links.text: You always get to be the crazy one, right? Fine, then.

links.title: Pissf****t: ""So are we done here or...?" one of..."
links.text: "So are we done here or...?" one of the jacket owners asks impatiently. "You don't need us around for your secret whisper party, do you?"

links.title: You: ""That works, I feel more like a 'FU..."
links.text: "That works, I feel more like a 'FUCK THE WORLD' kind of a guy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seems about right," the lieutenant..."
links.text: "Seems about right," the lieutenant remarks. "Especially considering your... heroic exit attempts."

links.title: Conceptualization: "That's an origin story for a dynami..."
links.text: That's an origin story for a dynamic duo right there.

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You wanted to know which jacket I'..."
links.text: "You wanted to know which jacket I'd wear, right? Neither. I'd wear neither."

links.title: You: ""You know what I'm implying.""
links.text: "You know what I'm implying."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I don't. What are you implying?""
links.text: "No, I don't. What are you implying?"

links.title: You: ""We should get these jackets.""
links.text: "We should get these jackets."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For what?""
links.text: "For what?"

links.title: You: ""What do people do with jackets? Th..."
links.text: "What do people do with jackets? They wear them."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The concept of getting dressed *is..."
links.text: "The concept of getting dressed *is* familiar to me, but wearing jackets like these isn't appropriate for an RCM officer. Unless he's *deep* undercover," he adds.

links.title: You: ""But in theory, Kim, if we were to..."
links.text: "But in theory, Kim, if we were to confiscate these jackets, which one would *you* wear?"

links.title: You: ""You're right of course. Never mind..."
links.text: "You're right of course. Never mind then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs.

links.title: Empathy: "It's a sigh of relief."
links.text: It's a sigh of relief.

links.title: You: ""What do you think about their jack..."
links.text: "What do you think about their jackets?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Leather jackets adorned with immat..."
links.text: "Leather jackets adorned with immature writing? The 'ideology' they convey helps the boys justify poor choices in life and fashion." The lieutenant shrugs. "I'm not a fan."

links.title: You: ""Why are you always so patronizing..."
links.text: "Why are you always so patronizing when cool *possibilities* cross our path?"

links.title: You: ""Sure, the jackets are scaring you...."
links.text: "Sure, the jackets are scaring you. That's cool."

links.title: You: "Definitely a coincidence."
links.text: Definitely a coincidence.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Your lack of imagination is bafflin..."
links.text: Your lack of imagination is baffling. But you do make up for it with... yes. Questions.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Is it a *coincidence* that here we..."
links.text: Is it a *coincidence* that here we have two bad-ass jackets and two bad-ass cops?

links.title: You: ""That is a terrible metaphor.""
links.text: "That is a terrible metaphor."

links.title: You: ""Actually -- forget about it.""
links.text: "Actually -- forget about it."

links.title: You: "Ask for the jackets for yourself an..."
links.text: Ask for the jackets for yourself and the lieutenant.

links.title: Half Light: "No, no, no! Don't *ask* anything. B..."
links.text: No, no, no! Don't *ask* anything. Be subtle and scary. The boys dream about being SKULLS... use that!

links.title: You: "Wait -- how?"
links.text: Wait -- how?

links.title: Half Light: "Suggest they're massive SKULLS. C'm..."
links.text: Suggest they're massive SKULLS. C'mon!

links.title: You: ""Boys, with *those* jackets, you're..."
links.text: "Boys, with *those* jackets, you're gonna be the SKULL-kings in no time!"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""What... no!" He quickly looks arou..."
links.text: "What... no!" He quickly looks around. "SKULLS don't have kings," he pauses. "I think, and we're not even *in* yet..."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yeah, man, keep your voice down. S..."
links.text: "Yeah, man, keep your voice down. SKULLS don't take it lightly, when folks pretend to be them. We're not even *prospects* yet."

links.title: Rhetoric: "'Prospect'? Must be a hierarchical..."
links.text: 'Prospect'? Must be a hierarchical term. Probably in the lower-end.

links.title: You: "(Raise your voice.) "Not even prosp..."
links.text: (Raise your voice.) "Not even prospects and already aspiring to be kings?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wow, you boys are ambitious," the..."
links.text: "Wow, you boys are ambitious," the lieutenant's voice rings over the plaza. "Only *prospects* and already planning a coup in the SKULLS? You're destined to go far!"

links.title: Half Light: "He gets it. Passive-aggressive flat..."
links.text: He gets it. Passive-aggressive flattery.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Shut the fuck up," the youth press..."
links.text: "Shut the fuck up," the youth presses through his clenched teeth, there's panic in his eyes. "Are you trying to get us killed?"

links.title: Half Light: "Now bring it to the jackets and......."
links.text: Now bring it to the jackets and.... yes, start *shouting*!

links.title: You: ""YES, WE WANNA BE A COOL KILLER SKU..."
links.text: "YES, WE WANNA BE A COOL KILLER SKULLS TOO, LIKE YOU GUYS, BUT WE DON'T HAVE SKULL-JACKETS!!!"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Please be quiet!" Not much is left..."
links.text: "Please be quiet!" Not much is left of the nihilistic rebel at this point. The young man before you is scared out of his mind. "What... WHAT do you want?!! T-t-the jackets?"

links.title: Empathy: "You got it. No need for cruelty."
links.text: You got it. No need for cruelty.

links.title: You: ""SKULL KING! MAKE SHRUNKEN HEADS OU..."
links.text: "SKULL KING! MAKE SHRUNKEN HEADS OUT OF US!"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Fuck you, man, take them then..."..."
links.text: "Fuck you, man, take them then..." He looks around the plaza -- people are noticing him now.

links.title: You: ""You OFFER us your jackets like tha..."
links.text: "You OFFER us your jackets like that? It'd be impolite to refuse." (Reach out your hand.)

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Oh man..." His shoulders slump und..."
links.text: "Oh man..." His shoulders slump under the weight of sadness. "Okay," he says finally. "I get it. SKULLS don't really wear slogans anyway, this was stupid."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Fuck," the other one sighs deeply."
links.text: "Fuck," the other one sighs deeply.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant watches the boys tak..."
links.text: The lieutenant watches the boys take their jackets off -- with mild amusement.

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "Remember when I sai..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "Remember when I said I'd like the 'Pissf****t' one? I got it -- you can have the other one!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's okay. I wouldn't wear eithe..."
links.text: "That's okay. I wouldn't wear either one anyway."

links.title: You: ""Why not? They're a pair. We could..."
links.text: "Why not? They're a pair. We could really raise hell. Go undercover. Hard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This case doesn't requires us to g..."
links.text: "This case doesn't requires us to go undercover. Or raise hell... In fact I don't think the jackets will be useful at all. I just wanted *them* to not have them anymore."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Cold-hearted cop...""
links.text: "Cold-hearted cop..."

links.title: You: ""Well, whatever. I'll take both of..."
links.text: "Well, whatever. I'll take both of them then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do. I'm fine with that.""
links.text: "Do. I'm fine with that."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Pity. The jackets are meant to comp..."
links.text: Pity. The jackets are meant to complete each other. If a man were standing alone on a street corner with 'PISSF****T' written on his back, it'd just be an individual that has taken a liking to urine. And 'FUCK THE WORLD' all on its own is, frankly, generic.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""I don't know, Eric. It's cold out...."
links.text: "I don't know, Eric. It's cold out..." The dark-haired young man just stands there, defeated. The wind blows.

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Yeah," the blond man replies. "Let..."
links.text: "Yeah," the blond man replies. "Let's get out of here. The cops fucked us."

links.title: You: ""Still -- it's good to know we have..."
links.text: "Still -- it's good to know we have a pair. In case the need arises."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The need will not arise.""
links.text: "The need will not arise."
Oh, the need *will* arise. Here's how we'll do it:
As soon as this conversation's done, *you* put on the Fuck-the-World jacket. We'll take it from there...

links.title: You: ""But don't you want to express your..."
links.text: "But don't you want to express your individuality?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I already *am* expressing my indiv..."
links.text: "I already *am* expressing my individuality."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""I'm not. I don't have a jacket any..."
links.text: "I'm not. I don't have a jacket anymore..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good -- I wanted you *not* to expr..."
links.text: "Good -- I wanted you *not* to express yours."

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "I said I prefer the..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "I said I prefer the 'Pissf****t' one, but you can have it if you like. The other one's cool too."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's gallant of you, but I'm not..."
links.text: "That's gallant of you, but I'm not wearing either jacket."

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "Since you said you'..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "Since you said you're more of a 'Pissf****t' kinda guy, I'll take the other one."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm absolutely okay with not havin..."
links.text: "I'm absolutely okay with not having either one, thank you."

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "I know you said you..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "I know you said you're more of a 'Pissf****t' kinda guy, but I think I should have it for myself."

links.title: You: "(Lower your voice.) "Yes -- the jac..."
links.text: (Lower your voice.) "Yes -- the jackets."

links.title: You: ""Wow. I didn't realize it's that se..."
links.text: "Wow. I didn't realize it's that serious. Let's forget about this." (Let it go.)

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Oh yeah, I'll forget about it alri..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, I'll forget about it alright. And you will too. Until the day the Void comes for you." He crosses his throat with his index finger.

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Let's just go, Fuck!" The blondie..."
links.text: "Let's just go, Fuck!" The blondie -- although visibly relieved -- is nervously glancing at the traffic jam. "This scene is dead anyway."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""FUCK THE FUCKING POLICE!!!!""
links.text: "FUCK THE FUCKING POLICE!!!!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't say anything." He turns away..."
links.text: "Don't say anything." He turns away from you. "Just let them go."

links.title: Half Light: "These guys aren't scary, *you're* n..."
links.text: These guys aren't scary, *you're* not scary -- I have nothing to work with here. It's either begging or bullying. Or both. Just ask them maybe?

links.title: You: ""Gentlemen, I need your jackets.""
links.text: "Gentlemen, I need your jackets."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Uh... why?""
links.text: "Uh... why?"

links.title: You: ""Do I have to answer that?""
links.text: "Do I have to answer that?"

links.title: Pissf****t: ""If you don't *have* to answer, the..."
links.text: "If you don't *have* to answer, then we don't *have* to give you our jackets." The young man shakes his head. "Doesn't sound like you have a reason."

links.title: You: "(Point at your clothes.) "Look at t..."
links.text: (Point at your clothes.) "Look at the shit I'm wearing!"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah, like you said, total shit. W..."
links.text: "Yeah, like you said, total shit. What about it?" There's a spark of sympathy in the youth's eyes.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You didn't say that."
links.text: You didn't say that.

links.title: You: ""It's not shit, it's disco...""
links.text: "It's not shit, it's disco..."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""It's shit.""
links.text: "It's shit."

links.title: You: ""Please...""
links.text: "Please..."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Fine, fuck it." The young man take..."
links.text: "Fine, fuck it." The young man takes his jacket off. "Here, take it then. I can't handle this sad shit."

links.title: Empathy: "It's true. He simply can't -- it's..."
links.text: It's true. He simply can't -- it's called empathy.

links.title: Half Light: "Wow. I did not see that coming. You..."
links.text: Wow. I did not see that coming. You better wear that jacket with pride!

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Fuck that, you're not getting mine..."
links.text: "Fuck that, you're not getting mine," the other one snaps at you. "My dad's a lawyer in La Delta. He'll have your badge!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, he won't.""
links.text: "No, he won't."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant is lightly amused by..."
links.text: The lieutenant is lightly amused by the situation.

links.title: You: ""Wait, World-fucker, you got a rich..."
links.text: "Wait, World-fucker, you got a rich dad?"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""N-no, uh..." He looks startled. "H..."
links.text: "N-no, uh..." He looks startled. "He's like a... like a volunteer lawyer... a total bitch. Cites law and does dishes..."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""You know what, cop? Fuck you, that..."
links.text: "You know what, cop? Fuck you, that's not what this is about, you're not getting my jacket!"

links.title: Half Light: "Fuck him. We don't need his rich da..."
links.text: Fuck him. We don't need his rich dad jacket anyway.

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "Remember when I sai..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "Remember when I said I'd like the 'Pissf****t' one? I got it! Wish I'd gotten the other one for you..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't wear it anyway.""
links.text: "I wouldn't wear it anyway."

links.title: You: ""Why not? You could really raise he..."
links.text: "Why not? You could really raise hell. Go undercover. Hard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think this case requires u..."
links.text: "I don't think this case requires us to go undercover. Or raise hell... In fact I don't think the jacket will be useful at all."

links.title: You: ""Well, whatever. I've got mine and..."
links.text: "Well, whatever. I've got mine and that's just fine."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you say so.""
links.text: "If you say so."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Look at this cute shit!" The dark..."
links.text: "Look at this cute shit!" The dark haired youth points at you -- then turns to his friend. "How can we become SKULLS if you go around fraternising with cops?! Let's get the fuck out of here before anyone sees us."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Fuck, I'm sorry, man." He hangs hi..."
links.text: "Fuck, I'm sorry, man." He hangs his head in shame. "I just... don't like confrontations that's all."

links.title: You: ""I'll just let you borrow this jack..."
links.text: "I'll just let you borrow this jacket... you know, should the need arise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The need will not arise.""
links.text: "The need will not arise."

links.title: You: ""But don't you want to express your..."
links.text: "But don't you want to express your individuality?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I already *am* expressing my indiv..."
links.text: "I already *am* expressing my individuality."

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "I did say I prefer..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "I did say I prefer the 'Pissf****t' one, but since I didn't get the other one -- you should have it!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's okay. I'm not wearing that..."
links.text: "That's okay. I'm not wearing that jacket."

links.title: You: ""Why not? You could really raise he..."
links.text: "Why not? You could really raise hell. Go undercover. Hard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think this case requires u..."
links.text: "I don't think this case requires us to go undercover. Or raise hell...  In fact I don't think the jacket will be useful at all."

links.title: You: ""Still. It's good to know that we h..."
links.text: "Still. It's good to know that we have it, should the need arise."

links.title: You: ""Okay, well. I'll keep it then.""
links.text: "Okay, well. I'll keep it then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do. I'm fine with that.""
links.text: "Do. I'm fine with that."

links.title: You: ""But don't you want to express your..."
links.text: "But don't you want to express your individuality?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I already *am* expressing my indiv..."
links.text: "I already *am* expressing my individuality."

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "I know you said you..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "I know you said you're more of a Pissf****t kinda guy, but we only have one jacket and I want it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm absolutely okay with not havin..."
links.text: "I'm absolutely okay with not having one."

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "Fuck it, we don't n..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "Fuck it, we don't need the other one. You said that you're more of a Pissf****t kinda guy, so I got the jacket for you!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not wearing that jacket.""
links.text: "I'm not wearing that jacket."

links.title: You: ""Fuck it, I don't deserve a cool ja..."
links.text: "Fuck it, I don't deserve a cool jacket, I suck."

links.title: You: ""I'm wearing horrible clothes to ca..."
links.text: "I'm wearing horrible clothes to catch horrible people. It's depressing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks down at his bo..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks down at his bomber jacket and shrugs, obviously content with *his* uniform.

links.title: You: ""My clothes make me sad, I need to..."
links.text: "My clothes make me sad, I need to *fun* it up."

links.title: You: ""Leather would be such a cool look..."
links.text: "Leather would be such a cool look on me..."

links.title: You: ""I need them for official police bu..."
links.text: "I need them for official police business."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""And what kind of business is that..."
links.text: "And what kind of business is that exactly?"

links.title: You: ""*Police* business.""
links.text: "*Police* business."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant notices your agitati..."
links.text: The lieutenant notices your agitation and opens his mouth to speak, but then decides against it and merely shakes his head.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Okay, we get it. You look like tot..."
links.text: "Okay, we get it. You look like total shit -- we look flashy as hell. What about it?" There's a spark of sympathy in the youth's eyes.

links.title: You: ""Well, talking with you has definit..."
links.text: "Well, talking with you has definitely been something." [Leave.]

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Hey, Pissf****t, look who it is! S..."
links.text: "Hey, Pissf****t, look who it is! Shrunken cop head material!"

dialogueTree.title: Pissf****t: ""The palm tree livery should be, li..."
dialogueTree.text: "The palm tree livery should be, like, pastel green. Fucking tropic shit..." He gazes dreamily at Lieutenant Kitsuragi's motor carriage.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""I can see it, bright as day. Oh, i..."
links.text: "I can see it, bright as day. Oh, if we were SKULLS right now..."

links.title: You: ""Who are you?""
links.text: "Who are you?"

links.title: Fuck the World: ""I can tell you who we're not, cop...."
links.text: "I can tell you who we're not, cop. We're *not* snitches, f****ts, or SKULLS."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""Which is not to say that the SKULL..."
links.text: "Which is not to say that the SKULLS are bitches and f****ts. On the contrary..."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""The part of this presentation you..."
links.text: "The part of this presentation you wanna take home with you, cop-man, is: We're not part of the SKULLS. Yet."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Okay then -- let's indulge in some..."
links.text: Okay then -- let's indulge in some intellectual exchange. These young men seem eager to share their beliefs.

links.title: Authority: "These *skull* people are more than..."
links.text: These *skull* people are more than an authority. They're deities.

links.title: You: ""We don't have time for this. Let's..."
links.text: "We don't have time for this. Let's go." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Pissf****t: ""That's one brutal motor carriage,"..."
dialogueTree.text: "That's one brutal motor carriage," says the young man with 'PISSF****T' written on his back.

links.title: Fuck the World: ""If I were a real SKULL now, I'd ja..."
links.text: "If I were a real SKULL now, I'd jack it, paint it in palm tree livery, then bottom-light it neon-style!" His companion wears a simple yet elegant slogan: 'FUCK THE WORLD'.

links.title: Pissf****t: ""A snazzy shit-ripped SKULL-mobile..."
links.text: "A snazzy shit-ripped SKULL-mobile like this would make a fine trophy. We could, like, hang fucking shrunken heads from the side mirrors! Cops' heads... Scary tribal shit."

links.title: Fuck the World: ""Yeah, tribal shit..." he agrees. "..."
links.text: "Yeah, tribal shit..." he agrees. "A cop-carriage like this would have proper SKULL value..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ahem." He steps in. "While I appre..."
links.text: "Ahem." He steps in. "While I appreciate the interest you take in my *brutal motor carriage*, I have to stop you right there. The RCM takes threats directed at its property seriously."

links.title: Pissf****t: ""I, uhm, it's just theoretical work..."
links.text: "I, uhm, it's just theoretical work, copper. No basis in reality." He turns to his companion: "Man, if we were certified SKULLS right now..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "SKULLS -- now there's a strong orga..."
links.text: SKULLS -- now there's a strong organizational title.

links.title: Authority: "Was it a good idea on the lieutenan..."
links.text: Was it a good idea on the lieutenant's part to get into this? Don't even answer that, just leave. You can always come back later -- on your own terms.
